content.html: The flavour of chicken meat depends on the bacteria in it (even after the germs are killed off after cooking). It’s literally tasteless without any bacteria. That’s why free range chicken that eat anything tastes great, factory birds fed bland meal and given antibiotics don’t.
content.value: The flavour of chicken meat depends on the bacteria in it (even after the germs are killed off after cooking). It’s literally tasteless without any bacteria. That’s why free range chicken that eat anything tastes great, factory birds fed bland meal and given antibiotics don’t.
